verbose_text: These CD8 + NKT cells produce more perforin and are CD8alphaalpha positive, similar to that detected on CD8 + NKT cells in PBMCs from healthy latent EBV infected subjects and IM patients at 1 year post-onset.
evidence: CD8 +  NKT cells produce more perforin and are CD8alphaalpha positive, similar to that detected on CD8 +  NKT cells in PBMCs from healthy latent EBV-infected subjects and IM
